column4: Jack Black True Volume Thickening Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Jack Black True Volume Thickening Shampoo - Imported (354 ml) Price: Rs.3800

Jack Black True Volume Thickening Shampoo 12 fl oz (354 ml). With Expansion Technology Basiland White Lupine True Volume Thickening Shampoo uses natural ingredients to help hair look thicker and fuller and keep scalp healthy and flake-free. Expansion Technology unique nano-technology with micro-sized particles delivers Creatine and Wheat Protein potent body-building ingredients into each hair shaft increasing the thickness of each strand for a volumized full appearance. White Lupine stimulates the scalp and hair follicles to sustain healthy hair growth and minimize hair loss. Natural antibacterial ingredients Basil and Tea Tree oil combat dry itchy skin reducing scalp irritation and flakiness. the PureScience formula locks in nature s best to please even the most sensitive skin - using a blend of naturally derived surfactants and certified organic ingredients with no fragrance parabens or colorants. Sodium Lauryl Sulphate SLS Free. Ideal of everyday use. Perfect for all hair types. Safe for color-treated hair. Vegan. What s in it Basil promotes a healthy flake-free scalp Nettle detoxifies hair and imparts a healthy sheen on hair Organic Sunflower Seed Extract provides protection from environmental pollutants Organic Sea Kelp Extract is mineral-rich and nourishes and softens hair White Lupine revitalizes and strengthens new hair growth for full thick hair Creatine improves hair volume and feel Soy Protein provides structure for thin or weak hair. Manufactured in the USA
